entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries beginning before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
